name: Restaurant Cookes Block
description:
Restaurant Cookes Block!!!
Become a manager of a small bistro and try to stay in business. Cook your own food and serve your hungry customers to survive a real restaurant fever! Cooking, crafting & building!
EATURES:
- Endless crafting & building opportunities!
- Craft a restaurant, design its building interior.
-Upgrade your kitchen to handle a hottest restaurant fever!
